title: One consistent finding in facial expressions

content.question: One of the consistent research findings in the area of facial expressions and emotion is best described by which of the following?

choices.label: Universality of facial expressions across cultures
Vast differences in facial expressions between males and females
Ease with which people can learn to change their facial expressions under differing circumstances
Way children’s facial expressions differ from adults’

content.answer: Universality of facial expressions across cultures

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
